Name: Rotten Pool
Description: Give venomed 3 to two adjacent enemies.

Name: Revitalize
Description: Draw a card and Restore 30 HP to friendly unit.

Name: Shadeshift
Description: Give Stealth and +20 Attack to two Allies.

Name: Illithid Act
Description: When the next enemy ally is played, gain control of it for 2 turns.

Name: Magic Mirror
Description: When the next enemy spell or ability is cast, counter and redirect it to new target(s).

Name: Papyrus of Imhotep
Description: Play a random Item or Spell from your deck.
